TextView.android:text: Assistance to Individuals and Families in Crisis Situation

Provision or extension of emergency financial assistance and referrals to hospitals, charitable institutions and other agencies to indigent individuals and families. This service covers burial, medical, housing, transportation, and food assistance.
1. Personal Identification Card -1 photocopy (Valid not expired ID’s such as Phil-health, Driver’s license, Passport ID, National ID, Voter’s ID, Postal ID, and Police Clearance
2. Certificate of Indigency/low income - original copy (issued by Punong Barangay confirming fire or landslide victim etc.)
3. Death Certificate of the deceased Senior Citizen member - 1 photocopy
7. Certificate of Active Membership of the Assoc.- 1 original copy
Office of the Barangay Senior Citizen’s Association
1. Requests for financial assistance of his/her immediate problem
Participates in data gathering/answers to questions asked
1.4. Prepares/ encodes case findings, vouchers and other attached documents
1.5. Signs and approves case findings and vouchers
1.6. Submits documents to MBO, MACCO, MMO, MTO
2.1. Conducts follow up for approval of financial assistance
